eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan

Class CheckedCkanClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.CkanClient
      • eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.CheckedCkanClient

  • public class CheckedCkanClient
extends CkanClient
    This client performs additional checks when writing to CKAN to ensure written content is correct. For this reason it might do additional calls and results of validation might be different from default Ckan ones. But if Ckan actually performed all the checks it should do there wouldn't be any need of this class as well..

    Note: For create operations, this client fails if item is already existing on the server. This behaviour is different from ckan default upsert behaviour (update an existing) to prevent misuse.

    Since:
    0.4.1
    Author:
    David Leoni

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static CkanClient.Builder builder()
        Returns a builder instance. The builder is not threadsafe and you can use one builder instance to build only one client instance.

      • createOrganization

        public CkanOrganization createOrganization(CkanOrganization org)
        Creates CkanOrganization on the server.

        NOTE: In CheckedCkanClient create operations fail if item already exists. This is different from Ckan default behaviour, which updates items if they already exist.

        Overrides:
        createOrganization in class CkanClient
        Parameters:
        org - requires at least the name or id. Only non-null fields of CkanGroupOrgBase will be sent to server.
        Returns:
        a new object with the created organization.

      • createResource

        public CkanResource createResource(CkanResourceBase resource)
        Creates ckan resource on the server.

        NOTE: In CheckedCkanClient create operations fail if item already exists. This is different from Ckan default behaviour, which updates items if they already exist.

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        resource - ckan resource object with the minimal set of parameters required. See CkanResource.CkanResource(String, String)
        Returns:
        the newly created resource

      • updateResource

        public CkanResource updateResource(CkanResourceBase resource)
        Description copied from class: CkanClient
        Updates a resource on the server using a straight resource_update call. Null fields will not be sent and thus won't get updated, but be careful about custom fields of CkanResourceBase.getOthers(), if not sent they will be erased on the server! To prevent this behaviour, see CkanClient.patchUpdateResource(CkanResourceBase)
        Overrides:
        updateResource in class CkanClient

      • patchUpdateResource

        public CkanResource patchUpdateResource(CkanResourceBase resource)
        Description copied from class: CkanClient
        Jackan specific. Patches a resource on the ckan server using a resource_update call. Todo: this is a temporary solution until we implement new patch api of CKAN 2.3
        Overrides:
        patchUpdateResource in class CkanClient
        Parameters:
        resource - ckan resource object. Fields set to null won't be updated on the server. Items present in lists such as others will be added to existing ones on the server. To support this behaviour provided resource might be patched with latest metadata from the server prior sending it for update.
        See Also:
        CkanClient.updateResource(CkanResourceBase)

      • createGroup

        public CkanGroup createGroup(CkanGroup group)

        NOTE: In CheckedCkanClient create operations fail if item already exists. This is different from Ckan default behaviour, which updates items if they already exist.

        Overrides:
        createGroup in class CkanClient
        Parameters:
        group - requires at least the name or id. Only non-null fields of CkanGroupOrgBase will be sent to server.
        Returns:
        a new object with the created group.

      • createDataset

        public CkanDataset createDataset(CkanDatasetBase dataset)
        Creates CkanDataset on the server. Will also create eventual resources present in the dataset.

        NOTE: In CheckedCkanClient create operations fail if item already exists. This is different from Ckan default behaviour, which updates items if they already exist.

        Overrides:
        createDataset in class CkanClient
        Parameters:
        dataset - Ckan dataset without id
        Returns:
        the newly created dataset

      • updateDataset

        public CkanDataset updateDataset(CkanDatasetBase dataset)
        Description copied from class: CkanClient
        Updates a dataset on the ckan server using a straight package_update call. Null fields will not be sent and thus won't get updated, but be careful about list fields, if not sent they will be erased on the server! To prevent this behaviour, see CkanClient.patchUpdateDataset(CkanDatasetBase)
        Overrides:
        updateDataset in class CkanClient

      • patchUpdateDataset

        public CkanDataset patchUpdateDataset(CkanDatasetBase dataset)
        Description copied from class: CkanClient
        Jackan specific. Patches a dataset on the ckan server using a package_update call. Todo: this is a temporary solution until we implement new patch api of CKAN 2.3
        Overrides:
        patchUpdateDataset in class CkanClient
        Parameters:
        dataset - ckan dataset object. Fields set to null won't be updated on the server. Items present in lists such as resources or extras will be added to existing ones on the server. To support this behaviour provided dataset might be patched with latest metadata from the server prior sending it for update.
